experience with an extensible languagean operational extensible language system is described.the system and its base language are appraised with respect to efficiency flexibility and utilityfor different categories of users.cacm january 1970irons e t.programming languages extensible compiler bootstrapping ambiguity4.12 4.22ca700105 jb february 14 1978 2:02 pm249 4 2126254 4 2126272 4 21261046 4 21261102 4 21261105 4 21261109 4 21261139 4 21261140 4 21261140 4 21261188 4 21261234 4 21261263 4 21261265 4 21261306 4 21261464 4 21261491 4 21261496 4 21261693 4 21261767 4 21261781 4 21261781 4 21261781 4 21261787 4 21261824 4 21261824 4 21261861 4 21261945 4 21261949 4 2126321 4 21262059 4 21262126 4 21262126 4 21262126 4 21262126 4 21262126 4 21262317 4 21262546 4 2126435 4 2126437 4 2126463 4 2126464 4 2126483 4 2126491 4 21262732 4 2126560 4 2126583 4 2126584 4 21263073 4 2126627 4 2126631 4 2126631 4 2126632 4 2126642 4 2126644 4 2126653 4 2126653 4 2126680 4 2126680 4 2126691 4 2126761 4 2126762 4 2126763 4 2126763 4 2126795 4 2126799 4 2126123 4 2126140 4 2126919 4 2126945 4 2126989 4 2126196 5 21261614 5 21261693 5 21262126 5 21262126 5 21262126 5 21262317 5 21262546 5 2126404 5 2126823 5 21261198 6 21261477 6 21261491 6 21261572 6 21261693 6 21261749 6 21261753 6 21261781 6 21262126 6 21262126 6 21262148 6 2126404 6 21263184 6 2126
